import memeData from "../memeData" const Meme =()=> { const getMeme =()=> { const memes = memeData.data.memes let idx = Math.floor(Math.random() * memes.length) // console.log(memes[idx].url) setMeme(prevState => ({ ...prevState, randomImage: memes[idx].url })) } return (
) } export default Meme
